author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: minimal npm installer for phantomjs and slimerjs with zero npm-dependencies
name: phantomjs-lite

scripts.test:
node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shReadmeExportPackageJson && for ARG0 in phantomjs slimerjs; do printf "testing $ARG0
" || exit $?; [ $(./index.js $ARG0 eval 'console.log("hello"); phantom.exit();') = 'hello' ] || exit $?; printf "passed
" || exit $?; done
